Year: 2022
Author: DiggingNoMore
URL: https://www.reddit.com/r/nfl/comments/wl03jv/the_number_of_times_each_team_lost_in_the/

The team that wins the Super Bowl obviously has to beat a number of teams to get there. Here's how many times each team has been eliminated in the playoffs by the team that ended up winning the Super Bowl. Team|Count|Non-SB Losses|Super Bowl Losses :--|:--|:--|:-- MIN|13|1971, 1977, 1982, 1987, 1988, 1989, 1999, 2009, 2017|1969, 1973, 1974, 1976 SF|12|1971, 1986, 1990, 1992, 1993, 1996, 2002, 2011, 2013, 2021|2012, 2019 OAK|10|1968, 1969, 1970, 1973, 1974, 1975, 2000, 2001|1967, 2002 PIT|10|1972, 1976, 1993, 1997, 2001, 2004, 2015, 2016|1995, 2010 DEN|9|1978, 2000, 2005, 2012|1977, 1986, 1987, 1989, 2013 NE|9|1976, 2006, 2012, 2015|1985, 1996, 2007, 2011, 2017 CHI|8|1977, 1984, 1987, 1988, 1990, 1994, 2010|2006 DAL|8|1966, 1967, 1981, 1982, 1994, 2007|1970, 1975, 1978 IND|8|1975, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2012, 2014|1968, 2009 TEN|7|1978, 1979, 1980, 2000, 2003, 2019|1999 ATL|6|1991, 2010, 2011, 2017|1998, 2016 CIN|6|1970, 1973, 2005|1981, 1988, 2021 GB|6|1993, 1995, 2007, 2011, 2020|1997 PHI|6|1992, 1995, 2002, 2010|1980, 2004 STL|6|1967, 1985, 1989|1979, 2001, 2018 BUF|5|1974|1990, 1991, 1992, 1993 KC|5|1997, 2006, 2018|1966, 2020 MIA|5|1979, 1998|1971, 1982, 1984 NYG|4|1981, 1984, 1985|2000 SD|4|1980, 2008, 2018|1994 WAS|4|1986, 2020|1972, 1983 ARI|3|2009, 2021|2008 BAL|3|2006, 2008, 2014| CAR|3|1996|2003, 2015| SEA|3|1983|2005, 2014| TB|3|1999, 2007, 2021| CLE|2|1972, 1980| DET|2|1982, 1991| HOU|2|2016, 2019| NO|2|2013, 2020| NYJ|2|1969, 1998| JAX|1|1997|
